Uses of Class
myChat.MultiClientHandler

    • Uses of MultiClientHandler in myChat

      Fields in myChat with type parameters of type MultiClientHandler 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Vector<MultiClientHandler> ServerCode.allConnected 
      Methods in myChat with parameters of type MultiClientHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ServerCode.allOnline(MultiClientHandler sender)
      in case client wants to see every member of the chat whose online, this method creats the string outout and sends it only to the requseting client
      static void ServerCode.Connect(java.lang.String name, MultiClientHandler origin)
      in case a client wants to connect, this method checks whether the name of client is in use, if not adds the thread which works with it to the vector and lets all clients know that new user is connected
      static void ServerCode.privateMessage(java.lang.String senderName, java.lang.String recivingName, java.lang.String message, MultiClientHandler origin)
      sends a message to chosen client (if there is one with the same user name)
